alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 24 at 2:30PM PDT until June 01 at 8:15PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT FRIDAY, JUNE 02... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues along the East Walker River. * WHERE...A portion of western Nevada, including the following county, Lyon. * WHEN...Until 300 PM PDT Friday Jun 02. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is expected to impact East Walker Road and other low lying areas. River flows are expected to remain elevated until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 220 PM PDT, Flooding will result in the advisory area from an upstream dam floodgate release. - Flows along the East Walker downstream of Bridgeport should remain mostly steady-state around 9.6 feet through the week with slight fluctuations due to rainfall in the basin. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southern Lyon County, including East Walker Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
